title: Can u get ranked border in the interval between December and January of new season?
body: Can u get ranked border in the interval between December and January of new season or does it have to be before november 11th ish?

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, the ranked border that shows is from the *last season*, so you'll need to place in ranked *this season* if you want a border to display in the preseason and full-on season next year.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
You won't earn any ranked rewards for the preseason as it has to be all done before the current season ends in November.
